description: A Flutter application main entry point defining the root widget and home page, with static UI components.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the Flutter app, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state for MyHomePage.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
